author: Aktuln.cz - Vte, co se prv dje
title: Ground News - Ninety minutes of horror. Film of 20 Days in Mariupol close-up shows bestiality of occupiers
text: The film 20 Days in Mariupol won the British Film Academy BAFTA television award and is favourite to win an Oscar in the best documentary category. The American Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences will award the awards night on Monday Our Time. The film is also part of the Human Rights Film Festival One World, which opens in the Czech Republic on March 20. Let's start with the worst.
